top-page.title: Get Rewarded Just for Paying Rent
top-page.desc: Every landlord in the game is wondering how to collect rent from tenants online, and the answer is simple: Rentorr. We allow you to connect your credit card or bank account to pay your landlord automatically each month. These automatic payments help boost your credit score.

title-one.title: How to Set Up Automatic Payments

item.title: It Starts with an Invitation
item.text: Your landlord will have to set up a payment series within their property management software. Rentorr will then send you an email inviting you to use our platform to pay your rent. If your landlord isn't using Rentorr, you can send them an invite, too.

item.title: Automate Your Payments
item.text: Rentorr will give you the option to set up recurring monthly payments. This will keep you from ever paying another late fee, and it will help your credit, too.

item.title: Turn on Credit Reporting
item.text: Once you opt in for this service, Rentorr will automatically report your on-time rent payments to the credit bureau, and you'll be rewarded with a higher credit score.

title-two.title: Why Choose Rentorr to Process Your Payments?

text-start.title: Improved Credit Score
text-start.text: You're already paying you rent, so wouldn't it be nice to get something in return? Rentorr reports your payment history so your credit goes up at the same time.

text-center.title: Automated Options
text-center.text: To err is human, but you don't have to pay late fees just because you've forgotten the date anymore. Set up automatic rent payments and Rentorr will remind you before the money is withdrawn each month.

text-end.title: Record Keeping
text-end.text: When you pay your rent with Rentorr, we keep a detailed history of receipts for all of the fees that you've paid, so you don't have to. You can access them anytime.

ready.title: Let Rentorr Make Your Life Easier
ready.desc: Don't stress over paying your rent each month, let Rentorr take care of that for you.

img-desc.title: Don't Worry-Your Information Is Safe with Us
img-desc.text: Rentorr doesn't keep your information-even when you've set up recurring payments. Plus, we work with Flutterwave to ensure that all of our connections with banks are secure, and your payment information is never in jeopardy.
